About Me

My name is Matthew Ryan Evans, and I am a freelance front-end developer. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and Javascript. I am currently studying Software Development at Western Governors University. The thing that excites me most about technology is that we have advanced to a state where we (the thinkers, the dreamers) are no longer bound by hardware limitations, but solely limited by the depth of our own imagination and ingenuity. If you dream it I can build it, these are the words I live by.

OnMax was developed to solve the issue enterpise was having in regards to the slow onboarding practices that dragged the process out of multipule days. I was taked with creating a solution... click to find out more

CPR-N-MORE.COM

CPR-N-MORE is a St. Louis based CPR and AED training company. Founded in 2006 I was one of the first independent contractors hired by the company tasked with creating mainting there online presence. The site is not just a landing page for there company, but also acts at the hub for the companys event planning and class roster system. Durring the early days of CPR-N-MORE the site also had an ecomerce component to it where they sold AED uints, this has since been removed form the website as of 2017 I no longer manage the CPR-N-MORE website.
